title: tyzen
author: tyzen
created_time: June 26, 2022, 05:19:28 PMLast edit: September 17, 2022, 07:33:13 AM by tyzen
content: Tyzen Core Wallet v23.100.1www.tyzen.ioTyzen are secure CPU Proof of Work (POW) mining meccanism with YescryptR16 AlgorithmAfter going through a difficult time in development and conducting various tests to prevent bugs or problems in the future, we are ready to publish a digital currency called Tyzen to everyone. with the aim of shortening transaction times and providing the lowest fees to users with the best quality and security.Tyzen uses a peer-to-peer blockchain network that connects one network to another to maintain the security of the Tyzen system from threats in the form of hacker attacks or illegal data changes by irresponsible people. responsible for personal gain."One notable innovation is the blockhain protocol, which was pioneered by the cryptocurrency Bitcoin. In 2009, when someone or a group of people using the name Satoshi Nakamoto launches the open source code for the Bitcoin software. Bitcoin introduces elegant solutions to several challenges as well as incentives for network nodes to stay up, make the Bitcoin network grow and strengthen it."Tyzen Core is the original Tyzen client and it builds the backbone of the network. It downloads and, by default, stores the entire history of Tyzen transactions, which requires approximately.To download the wallet, please go to Tyzen.io Download pageWALLETSetup for WindowsBundle WindowsUbuntu 22.04Ubuntu 20.04Ubuntu 18.04Play StoreDirect Download AndroidAll ReleaseMining using PoolThere is a pool that support tyzen mining on Mining Pool Statszergpool.comCode:-a yescryptR16 -o stratum+tcp://yescryptR16.asia.mine.zergpool.com:6333 -u YourWallet --timeout 120 -p c=TZN,mc=TZN,ID=WorkerNamezpool.caCode:-a yescryptR16 -o stratum+tcp://yescryptR16.mine.zpool.ca:6333 -u TZN_ADDRESS -p c=TZN,zap=TZNpool.rplant.xyzCode:-a yescryptr16 Â -o stratum+tcps://stratum-asia.rplant.xyz:17044 -u YourAddress.WorkerNameExchangesEXBITRONTZN - USDTTZN - LTCEXCHANGE-ASSETSTZN - USDTTZN - BTCMarket CapitalizationsLiveCoinWatchCoinPaprikaCoinGecko(Need more volume on market)Tyzen specifications:Full name: TYZEN (TZN)Max Supply: 100,000,000 TZNBlock reward: 50 TZNBlock halving: 950,000 blocksAverage block time: 1.5 MinutesAlgorithm: YescryptR16Difficulty retarget: Every block (DarkGravityWave ver. 3)Tyzen network information:Wallet Version: v1.0.0-1RPC Port: 2332P2P Port: 2333Genesis: 0x59ceec40a8afa8bd23bbb5fff924b47cf5a320afa3c2de6f78cab06fdfe83427Markle Root: 0x15f4f969a7196ff4fb32b2a70ad32133e05b0c8f1b5ef20847e58b030da47bcaNode List: https://node.tyzen.ioTyzen website information:Main Website: www.tyzen.ioTyzen Faucet: faucet.tyzen.ioMemcrypto Faucet: faucet.mecrypto.club/TZN/Tyzen.Live Explorer: www.tyzen.liveMain Explorer: explorer.tyzen.ioDocumentation: docs.tyzen.liveNode List: node.tyzen.ioImage Assets: assets.tyzen.ioSource Code: Tyzen stagging treeTyzen community information:Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/tyzen/Twitter: https://twitter.com/TyzenIoDiscord: https://discord.gg/tyzen / https://discord.gg/y3t4VyA9wbTelegram: https://t.me/tyzeninfoThanks for Note : I don't make money with this, i made it all with my own saving money, without strong community the coin will worth nothing. I will keep working and saving some more money for exchange listing.. i promise less than 6 months.  (it's been fulfilled)

comments.author: Omnicron69
comments.body: Now if I could only get ccminer to work in Hiveos...that would put me over 100kh

comments.author: BoozyTalking
comments.body: Looks like developer (or just another crypto coins copy-paster) is from 2018and think yescrypt-** algos still only cpu algos.

comments.author: ahousefavor
comments.body: This is just a copy of scam-coin "nooncoin" How do I know? Because in various spots you forgot to change the name from nooncoin to tyzen. Give it a look

comments.author: Viecoin
comments.body: Threw 20kh/s at it for a few hours and got about 200 tzn. Any plans to update the logo? I swear it looks identical to the Firefox logo.

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added Tyzen (TZN) to http://zpool.ca/algo/yescryptR16. See below for connection details.Fee only: 0.5% or lessPayouts are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine yescryptR16 and get paid in TZN:Code:-a yescryptR16 -o stratum+tcp://yescryptR16.mine.zpool.ca:6333 -u TZN_ADDRESS -p c=TZN,zap=TZN All of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for yescryptR16: 56333==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_

Give it a looki am not forget, i leave it becouse i own noon before, due covid, i leave that project and all of the team are leaving, it's hard timei can't continue it, no node that stored the blockchain data, the data on chainparams.cpp is not mistake, i want to remember ithttps://github.com/nooncoin/nooncoin {MIGRATED}

comments.author: tyzen
comments.created_time: August 11, 2022, 03:35:00 AMLast edit: August 11, 2022, 03:45:44 AM by tyzen
comments.body: Tyzen mobile wallet build release v1.0Only for androidA simple wallet that allow you to receive and send tyzen coinFeatures :Login & RegisterPin codeSeed passphraseSend & ReceiveLatest priceQR CodeTransaction HistoryYou can download the wallet with this link :https://studio.tyzen.io/tyzenwallet/downloads/tyzen-wallet-1.0.apkNotes :Make sure to backup the Seed passphrase ! That is the only one way you can recover your balanceI am not responsible for losing your passphrase seed, even I myself will not be able to recover your account without the passphrase seedThe email on the registration form is not used to reset the password

comments.author: garmin
comments.created_time: August 22, 2022, 03:20:26 PMLast edit: August 22, 2022, 03:43:24 PM by garmin
comments.body: FYIzergpool.com has #2 hashpower ATM https://miningpoolstats.stream/tyzenSmaller miners beware the payout threshold is over 900 TZN and 180 on Sunday, a pretty high bar for small miners.
